definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

definition: Mt Tatun, volcanic area to the north of Taipei

sentences.english: Island group from the volcanic island and cays .
sentences.chinese: 島羣由火山島和珊瑚礁組成。

sentences.english: The biggest volcano is Olympus Mons .
sentences.chinese: 最大的火山是奧林匹斯火山。

sentences.english: The biggest volcano is Olympus Mons .
sentences.chinese: 最大的火山是奧林匹斯火山。

sentences.english: The origin type of ore deposit is a subvolcanic hydrothermal gold - bearing , altered rock type.
sentences.chinese: 礦牀成因類型爲次火山熱液含金蝕變巖型。

sentences.english: Lunar olivine was created by great volcanoes called fire fountains, which sprayed superheated lava into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月之橄欖石產生於名爲“火噴泉”的巨型火山。

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至週二，冰島火山仍在噴發，但火山灰雲有所降低。

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至週二，冰島火山仍在噴發，但火山灰雲有所降低。

sentences.english: Ashfalls can suffocate plants and poison livestock.
sentences.chinese: 降落的火山灰能悶死植物，毒害牲畜。

sentences.english: Some rocks from volcanoes break down to form black sand.
sentences.chinese: 有些火山岩被撞碎後會形成黑色的沙。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from the volcanic cloud.
sentences.chinese: 成羣的馬匹正飛奔逃離火山熔岩灰霧。

sentences.english: Eg: There are many dormant volcanoes in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上有許多休眠的火山。

sentences.english: The volcano could just have entered a period of low activity.
sentences.chinese: 火山可能只是進入低活動期。

sentences.english: This resembles volcanic ash, which is predominantly composed of minerals such as pyroxene and olivine.
sentences.chinese: 這類似於火山灰，這是主要組成礦物如輝石和橄欖石。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from volcanic ash April 17, 2010 near Eyjafjallajokull, Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰島艾雅法拉火山附近馬羣逃離火山灰。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from volcanic ash April 17, 2010 near Eyjafjallajokull, Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰島艾雅法拉火山附近馬羣逃離火山灰。

sentences.english: Mount Unzen is one of more than a thousand active volcanoes that circle the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 雲仙嶽是千餘座活火山這個圈子太平洋之一。
